pullRequest.title: Add test case for IDP initiated SAML SSO process.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes

Added test case for IDP initiated SAML SSO login process.
Introduces new method in AbstractSAMLSSOTestCase to create a service provider which enabled the IDP initiated SSO.

nodes.bodyText: Add java doc comments for all the public methods.
Add a comment to explain the class
